column3: Previous discussion was in #7349, where it was decided _not_ to automatically use an installed univalue in favor of the included one.\n
Why would you opt for system default?  Out of interest.\n

Standard best practices. Libraries shouldn't be bundled _at all_. We have a reasonable case for bundling consensus-critical ones like LevelDB and libsecp256k1, but Univalue is not consensus-critical at all.\n
We're not going to do this (at least for the forseeable future), so closing for now.\n
